ygData.subject: RE: Another take on twinking
ygData.messageBody:
Umm...Lord Nagafen.

Lei

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Lombard.Mikhael [mailto:Mikhael_Lombard@...]

> To: 'EQ-Monks@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Another take on twinking
>
>
> From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
>
> That cloak rules big time where do you get it and what mob drops it?
>
> Kaladiel
> 20th Lvl (just made last night)
> Brell
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dave Gaines [mailto:dave@...]
> Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 8:22 AM
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Another take on twinking
>
>
> From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
>
> Cloak of Flames:
>
> AC10
> Dex +9 Agi +9 HP:+50 SV_FIRE + 15
> Haste
> Weight 0.1
>
> Usable by All/All
>
> Another would be the cloak of the shadows, AC12, dex+13 etc.
>
> but both of these are usable by all, I can't find
> any type of blood cloak.
> >
> > From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
> >
> > Is there a special cloak for monks only, my friend was
> telling me about it
> > yesterday. He said it was a blood something I think,
> anybody heard about
> > this?
> >
